description:
Comfy doesn’t need to be complicated. Made using soft cotton, these long sleeve tees keep it simple.

  • Fabrics vary, solid colours are 100% cotton, and heathers are 50% cotton and 50% polyester
  • Uses US cotton that comes from farms using agricultural practices to help build soil carbon – 75% in solid colours and 50% in heathers
  • Circular design product life cycle, made from recycled materials and recyclable at the end of its life
  • Regular fit wears just like you hoped they would
name: The North Face Long Sleeve Hit Graphic Tee - Men's

value: 2 or more fabrics; see description2 or more fabrics; see description
